name: Gerber Doubledown Folding Machete
categories: Pocket knives and fixed blade knives
description: A useable machete in a packable size. Super-versatile it functions as a  hatchet, knife or machete. The handle secures open or closed, and has  as independent 2-stage locks on both sides. From clearing trails, to feeding the campfire, to prepping sticks for cooking, it can do it all.420HC blade is easy to sharpen and holds an edge well.Quad locking system uses multiple safeties and locking mechanisms.Jimping on the blade spine for control while batoning.Ergonomic handle with low grip for mechanical advantage while chopping.Durable handle uses stainless steel liners over glass reinforced nylon.Slight recurve blade allows finer cuts, great for whittling marshmallow sticks.Compact guard puts something between your hand and what you’re chopping.Included sheath straps to your belt, pack or any MOLLE webbing.
